name: chirp
description: The ultimate communal voice chat app. Experience the joy of large gatherings, in the comfort of your own home! This proximity voice chat lets you join massive rooms, without being bombarded with noise. Join a room and grab a seat at a table! Bring your friends! As a gamer with social anxiety, I was inspired to create chirp so we can come together to truly experience the joy of socialization in a low pressure, comfy environment.
author: Jade K VanAlsburg
